    \index{etude \textit{(package)}!etude.exceptions \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module etude.exceptions}

    \label{etude:exceptions}
to be logged, an exception must not be caught in the same function where it
was raised (at least one level of difference).

if it goes through different functions,  it will be printed as many times 
as there are decorators for theses functions (not good).

={\textgreater} have one logging level where to handle exceptions, that is 
quite general to monitor the operations. (forces abstraction)
